There are five levels of misdemeanor Driving While Intoxicated. Level I is the most serious and Level V the least. Level V Punishable by a fine up to $200 and a minimum jail sentence of 24 hours and a maximum of 60 days. A judge can suspend the sentence but upon completion that the driver spend 24 hours in jail, perform 24 hours of community service or not operate a vehicle for 30 days. Level IV Punishable by a …
